sentences.sContent: It is the reason why the wildcatter, the independent oilman whose test drillings might come up dry 20 times before gushing in the end, is an enduring Texas symbol.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is the reason why the wildcatter, the independent oilman whose test drillings might come up dry 20 times before gushing in the end, is an enduring Texas symbol.
sentences.sCn: 这就是为什么那些在投机商，那些个体石油商在石油喷发前可能要试钻探多达二十次的原因，这也是德州一直以来的标志。

words.tran: 盲目开掘油井；从事非法商业活动
